channel.title: Compiler Error
channel.description:
Can someone help me fix this issue please? I am trying to compile a change I made on my client's IP to connect to, but am getting this issue when compiling. I have JDK latest (21)
[IMG]http://i33.tinypic.com/2cfe3p2.png[/img]

item.title: Compiler Error
item.dc:creator: @xchr0nicx xchr0nicx
item.description:
@xchr0nicx wrote:

Still getting the error, same one

I am trying to compile ElitePK client, if you need link I can send it.

EDIT - here it is - http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,410431.0.html

Download the client file, I edited the gui.java file to fit my server IP, and now I cannot compile, to make it to the .class file…

Read full topic

item.title: Compiler Error
item.dc:creator: @Mwf2 Mwf2
item.description:
@Mwf2 wrote:

I dont know if this one will work, but put ur old one in a different notepad before u put this in…

@echo off @TITLE Redemption Pkz Compiler :D if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error) :compile for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java) if defined p (goto end) :error echo You Havent Downloaded Java :P.... :end echo Finished! pause exit

click “Saveas” then click yes when it asks to replace. try compileing, and tell me if it worked

Read full topic

item.title: Compiler Error
item.dc:creator: @xchr0nicx xchr0nicx
item.description:
@xchr0nicx wrote:

Ground zero 317:

edit the compiler and put it to update 21 and if you havent done it already fix the class path

I did and that is the error I got, here is the compiler code…

@echo off title Simple Compiler "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_21\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java pause

Read full topic
